output_index.description: The output index number (vout) of the outpoint being spent. The first output in a transaction has an index of 0. Not present if this is a coinbase transaction

script_sig.description: An object describing the signature script of this input. Not present if this is a coinbase transaction

txid.description: The TXID of the outpoint being spent, encoded as hex in RPC byte order. Not present if this is a coinbase transaction.

txid_as_number.description: Integer representation of the transaction id.

txinwitness.description: Hex-encoded witness data. Only for segregated witness transactions
